title: amudam innamudam
sahitya:
amudam innamudam ayyappa nin nAmam anudinam bhajittAl aDaindiDalAm kSEmam


anupallavi

  amararum pUjikkum arum karuNai vaLLalE azhaguyar shabarimalai amarndALum aNNalE


caraNam    ayyappa nin pErai anbuDan shonnAlE aruL inbam nenjinil arumbadu sennALE
uyyavE vazhi kATTum unadarumai nAmam unnata neri vAzhvai uDam tarum tiru nAmam
